org.imaginea.test.automation.framework.dom.filter

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.imaginea.test.automation.framework.dom.filter.Filter

  • public class Filter
extends Object
    Created by menonvarun on 03-12-2014. Filters that is used for filtering the WebElements. Mainily used By EWebElement class
